sentences.en: "They wanted to stop my dole money for those days." — "Charming!"
sentences.cn: “他们想停掉我那些日子的救济金。”——“岂有此理！”

sentences.en: another 21,300 people &B{joined the dole queues} in May.
sentences.cn: 五月份又有21,300人领取失业救济金。

sentences.en: Another 29,100 people have joined the dole queue.
sentences.cn: 又有29,100人加入了失业大军。

sentences.en: Bob Dole seemed less than enthusiastic about the proposed move.
sentences.cn: 鲍勃·多尔似乎对提议的这项行动不太感兴趣。

sentences.en: I go back on the dole when the shooting season's finished.
sentences.cn: 狩猎季节过后，我又重靠领取救济金过活。

sentences.en: I got out my wallet and began to dole out the money.
I had to sign on the dole on Monday.
sentences.cn: 我只好于星期一办理了领取失业救济金的登记。

sentences.en: I spent years on the dole trying to get bands together and I never worried about money then.
sentences.cn: 我多年靠救济金过活，一直在努力组建乐队，那时，我从不为钱发愁。

sentences.en: If you work without signing off the dole you are breaking the law.
sentences.cn: 如果就业后未注销领取失业救济金的登记视为触犯法律。

sentences.en: Instead, the nomination went to Senator Robert Dole of Kansas.
sentences.cn: 相反, 提名给了堪萨斯州的罗伯特?多尔参议员.

sentences.en: It's not easy living on the dole.
sentences.cn: 靠领取失业救济金生活并不容易。

sentences.en: Louis Pasteur, French chemist and bacteriologist, was born at Dole.
sentences.cn: 法国化学家、细菌学家路易·巴斯德生于多尔.

sentences.en: Other benefits such as dole money could be frozen and there will be a huge push to weed out fiddlers.
sentences.cn: 其他像失业救济金这样的补贴可能会被冻结，大家会努力把骗子清除掉。

sentences.en: T-shirts are a nice little earner and it's better than the dole.
sentences.cn: 卖T恤衫来钱容易，比领救济金好。

sentences.en: The number claiming dole went up by 3,500.
sentences.cn: 申请领取救济金者增加了3,500人。

sentences.en: The number of jobless Britons claiming the dole is now about 960, 000.
sentences.cn: 现在申领失业救济金的英国人大约有96万.

sentences.en: Two years later he is flat broke and on the dole.
sentences.cn: 两年后，他一贫如洗，靠失业救济金生活。

words.tran_cn: [劳经]失业救济金；赈济物；施舍品

phrases.tran_cn: 领取固定救济的：从政府或政府一类的机关那里接受固定救济的

trans.tran_en: money given by the government in Britain to people who are unemployed
to distribute, esp in small portions
